name: galactic-key
effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.
short_effect: Grants access to Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.

flavor_text.black-white: A card key for disengaging security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: A card key for disengaging security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.
